flawed_nl_solution:

In round two, Jeff completed 16 - 3 = <<16-3=9>>9.
In round three, Jeff completed 16 + 4 = <<16+4=20>>20.
In round four, Jeff completed 16 / 2 = <<16/2=8>>8.
Jeff completed 15 + 9 + 20 + 8 = <<15+9+20+8=52>>52 skips in total.
Jeff skipped an average of 52 / 4 = <<52/4=13>>13 skips per round.
